Our Message

The fundamentals of our faith
    But speaking the truth in love, may grow up into him in all things, which is the head, even Christ.
    - Ephesians 4:15
  • Calvary's Christ
    Growing into His likeness for His glory.

  • Calvary's Commitment
    Speaking the truth in love.

  • Calvary's Character
    Belief with faith's practice as an independent church fundamental in doctrine.


Our Church

Location

516 W Jefferson
St Peter, Minnesota


Our Pastor

Pastor Dave Johnson

After graduating Pillsbury Baptist Bible College in Owatonna, Minnesota, Pastor Dave continued his theological education by attending Central Baptist Theological Seminary in Plymouth, Minnesota, and Bob Jones University in Greenville, South Carolina, achieving Master of Divinity and Doctor of Philosophy, respectively. Pastor Dave served earlier as pastor at several other churches across the nation before arriving at Calvary in 2014.

He has two children, Charity and David, and enjoys carpentry and hunting in his free time.
